CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MNTN is on a mission to transform Connected TV into a next-generation performance marketing channel. Our revolutionary Performance TV ("PTV") software platform allows marketers to combine the powerful storytelling format of TV advertising with the targeting, measurement and attribution capabilities of paid search and social advertising. Our self-serve software platform enables marketers to precisely target audiences through our MNTN Matched technology and then directly attribute each view to a purchase or other action.
